info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 11 at 5:45PM PDT until August 11 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL NYE AND NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 545 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms continue to develop and train over the same area producing very heavy rain across far northwest Clark and southern Nye Counties. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of East Central Nye and Northwestern Clark Counties FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
